author: cadelfistro
content:
i was a bit frustrated in jun 2018 after the pivot to the new design for eth2 was not clearly communicated, but i can't say that has been the case in the last year+
client teams are pushing regular updates, Danny's state of eth2 posts are as frequent  as they are informative, attacknets and bug bounty program are up,audits are being conducted at all levels,fuzzing is ongoing.
this is the final stretch i don't care one iota if there's a delay of a few more months(or whatever time is needed).i've been extremely impressed with the project management on eth2 tbh

author: cadelfistro
content: back on topic, eth2 call tomorrow <@!291925846556540928> ?

author: Deleted User
content: In case I came across as too negative, I just want to say I really appreciate all the hard work done by Danny and the ETH devs, and thank you for all the effort.
